DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test two different approach help individual recently start eat healthful diet maintain healthy change . This study deliver health program use automate telephone system . The program design help individual maintain healthy diet change lifetime .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Automated Telephone Programs Maintenance Dietary Change
DOC.detailed_description: RCT complete . However , eligibility 18 y/o great living Greater Boston area . The participant use evidence base dietary intervention 3 month randomize 1 3 arm . Those experimental arm receive 6 mo intervention base social cognitive theory goal system theory . The intervention design help participant maintain previously achieve change diet , e.g. , fruits vegetable . The outcome measure fruit vegetable consumption measure serving multiple dietary measure well 24 hr dietary recall .
DOC.criteria: Consume few 5 fruit vegetable per day . Understand conversational English Have ability use telephone without assistance Under 18 year age Diagnosis health condition dietary recommendation would contraindicate , Have cognitive impairment Have terminal illness , recent myocardial infarction , current former diagnosis eat disorder , pregnancy Consume > 5 serving fruit vegetable per day , Plan move away Boston area le 30 month .
DOC.keyword: automate telephony , cancer prevention , healthy diet
